X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X , y, test_size=0.2)

from sklearn.metrics import r2_score, confusion_matrix, accuracy_score, recall_score, precision_score






confusion_matrix(y_test, y_pred), accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred), recall_score(y_test, y_pred), precision_score(y_test, y_pred)
